p: Noroviruses (NoVs) are a major cause of epidemic gastroenteritis in children and adults. They cause nearly half of all gastroenteritis cases and > 90% of nonbacterial gastroenteritis epidemics worldwide [ 20]. NoVs have also been identified in several mammalian species, including cows, pigs, lion, dogs and cats, sea lions, bats, and harbor porpoises [ 11, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29].
